meanings.definition: A group of metallic elements in the periodic table.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of lanthanons in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Lanthanons are found in the rare earth minerals.
meanings.sent3: The collection of lanthanons decided to form a band and play music together.
meanings.sent4: The lanthanons shone brightly in the darkness of the periodic table.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with gleaming lanthanons.

meanings.sent1: The periodic table includes lanthanons with atomic numbers between 57 and 71.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use lanthanons to study atomic properties.
meanings.sent3: The lanthanons threw a party to celebrate their atomic numbers.
meanings.sent4: The atomic numbers of lanthanons danced in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The classroom chart displayed the atomic numbers of the lanthanons clearly.

meanings.sent1: Miners searched for lanthanons deep underground.
meanings.sent2: Lanthanons are crucial components in technology.
meanings.sent3: The rare earth squirrel collected shiny lanthanons for its nest.
meanings.sent4: The rare earth garden bloomed with colorful lanthanons.
meanings.sent5: The spaceship was powered by the rare and valuable lanthanons.
